Hiya .. I recently gave a couple of talks on REST vs. WS-*: Facts, Myths 
and Lies. See:

http://sanjiva.weerawarana.org/2007/11/rest-vs-ws-facts-myths-and-lies.html

I'm sure a few people here will disagree with me on some of my views on 
REST ;-). I'd be very happy to be educated and also to debate some of the 
details - comments on my blog are preferred but I'll be happy to follow up 
on this list too. (I've been a lurker for a while!)

Bye,
